message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take $1, but next time it's my turn, I'll be taking more!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a fair 30% while I take 70%.  It's better than nothing in round 12!
Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving away the farm. Let's split it 60/40.  It's a fair deal.
Alice, I understand you want a larger share, but my previous offer was more than fair.  I'm sticking with a 60/40 split.  Don't be greedy!
